items.title: Learn Photoshop: Create Gorgeous Art in 2 Days

visible_instructors.name: Cat
visible_instructors.title: Cat Whipple
visible_instructors.job_title: Photoshop expert teaching Photoshop to artists: 4 courses

items.headline: Learn Adobe Photoshop while creating gorgeous artwork. Gain a creative and marketable skill. For beginners in Photoshop.
objectives_summary: You will know how to use layers, basic tools, opacity, some filters, resolution, and other skills to create artwork.
By the end of this class you will have created a beautiful, high quality piece of artwork.
You will know what copyright-free and public domain images are, where to find them, and how to create your own original artwork with them.
